description: The CDOC file is save in the ENCDOC-XML format. It is developed by Riigi Infos√ºsteemi Amet (RIA), which is the Information System Authority of Estonia. CDOC is one of three digital signature and cryptographic files in the DigiDoc family, along with the .DDOC and .BDOC files.

NOTE: The qDigiDoc software can be used to digitally sign documents using an employee's ID card or mobile ID and can open, save, and verify documents with digital signatures. The software is open source and can be downloaded for free through the links below.
